name: Google Style +
description: Hi guys! Welcome to a style for Google: Google Style + This gives a rainbow background, a different font(Noto Sans), and a button effect( when hovered ). That is all for now, comment down below if you want to improve it! Comment "youtube" if you want a YouTube style!
additional_info: Note: I am not a pro at change log. Also, I don't know how to set the style to specific website; it doesn't work Version Alpha 0.1: Released
